get.description:
Returns list of articles with specified search parameters.
The authorization scopes required for this operation are:
openid twf.organisationUser twf.user (readArticles | writeArticles)

parameters.name: searchPattern
parameters.description: Pattern of article name. Default value is empty string

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset. Number of articles that should be skipped if any found. Default value is 0

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max count of articles in list. Default value is 50

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Name of article field which should be used for ordering list. Default value is name

parameters.name: customerCultureCode
parameters.description: Culture code of article's customer

parameters.name: vats
parameters.description: List of VAT IDs which belongs to articles

parameters.name: grossPriceFrom
parameters.description: Min value of article's gross price

parameters.name: grossPriceTo
parameters.description: Max value of article's gross price

parameters.name: searchScope
parameters.description: Translation scope where seach will be done

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description:
Specifying certain media types (application/hal+json, application/json) 
			which are acceptable for the response. 
			Specifying required API version in format 'version=api_version', where 'api_version' is number or 'latest'

parameters.name: organisationId
parameters.description: The GUID of the organisation

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The GUID of the company

200.description: Returns list of articles with specified search parameters

403.description: The current role doesn't have access to this functionality

post.description:
Creates new article with properties specified in parameters.
The authorization scopes required for this operation are:
openid twf.organisationUser twf.user writeArticles

parameters.name: articleData
parameters.description: Object that contain properties of new article. Value for revenueTypeId can be ommited, in this case it'll be updated to default

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description:
Specifying certain media types (application/hal+json, application/json) 
			which are acceptable for the response. 
			Specifying required API version in format 'version=api_version', where 'api_version' is number or 'latest'

parameters.name: organisationId
parameters.description: The GUID of the organisation

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The GUID of the company

403.description: The current role doesn't have access to this functionality

422.description: Article code is already in use

patch.description:
In article only provided fields are updated with provided values.
JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) Patch rule can be found in specification: https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6902. Available operations: 'add', 'remove', 'replace'.
The authorization scopes required for this operation are:
openid twf.organisationUser twf.user writeArticles

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of article

parameters.name: patchRequest
parameters.description: Object that contains PATCH operations

			which are acceptable for the response. 
			Specifying required API version in format 'version=api_version', where 'api_version' is number or 'latest'

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: Version of article. Could be '*' or version number

parameters.name: Twinfield-Nonce
parameters.description: Nonce that can be used to execute unique request

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content-Type should be application/json-patch+json. For more information: https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6902

parameters.name: organisationId
parameters.description: The GUID of the organisation

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The GUID of the company

get.description:
Returns a list of ledger accounts with the specified search parameters.
The authorization scopes required for this operation are:
openid twf.organisationUser twf.user (readBookkeeping | readBudgets | readCustomers | readFixedAssets | readSuppliers | readVat | readVatGroup)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of ledger accounts that should be skipped if any found. The default value is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of ledger accounts to return. The default value is 50. The minimum value is 1.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Order results by 'Code, Name'.

parameters.name: asc
parameters.description: Order results ascending or descending. See OrderBy.

parameters.name: searchPattern
parameters.description: Search pattern. It is used for searching by name and code. Default value is empty string.

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: Filter by account type. Available account types are: 'Activity, Balance, CostCenter, Creditor, Debtor, FixedAsset, ProfitAndLoss, Project'. The default value is 'Balance,ProfitAndLoss'.

parameters.name: modifiedSince
parameters.description: If present accounts modified on or after the specified time are returned.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description:
Specifying certain media types (application/hal+json, application/json) 
			which are acceptable for the response. 
			Specifying required API version in format 'version=api_version', where 'api_version' is number or 'latest'

parameters.name: organisationId
parameters.description: The GUID of the organisation

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The GUID of the company

200.description: Returns a list of ledger accounts with the specified search parameters.

403.description: The current role doesn't have access to this functionality

options.description:
Returns a list of possible operations with ledger accounts.
The authorization scopes required for this operation are:

get.summary: Returns budget lines filtered by specified parameters.
get.description:
Returns paged list of budget lines filtered by specified parameters.
The authorization scopes required for this operation are:
openid twf.organisationUser twf.user (readBudgets | writeBudgets)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of budget line belongs to

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Year budget line made for

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Optional, Period of budget lines to be selected

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Optional, The type of budget line value to be selected, allowed values Monetary, Quantity and all. Default value is All

parameters.name: generalLedgerId
parameters.description: Optional, General ledger accound id budget lines to be selected

parameters.name: costCenterId
parameters.description: Optional, cost center accound id budget lines to be selected

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Optional, project accound id budget lines to be selected

parameters.name: modifiedSince
parameters.description: Optional. Filters budget lines modified since specified date. The default value is null.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset. Number of budget lines that should be skiped if any found. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max count of budget lines in list. Default value is 50.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Optional, field name for order. Possible values: 'createdAt' or 'lastModifiedAt'. Uses default order if it is not specified.

parameters.name: asc
parameters.description: Optional, asceding or desceding order. The default value is true.

parameters.name: organisationId
parameters.description: The GUID of the organisation

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The GUID of the company

200.description: Returns paged list of budget lines filtered by specified parameters.

403.description: The current role doesn't have access to this functionality

404.description: No budget with specified id exists

get.description:
Get all scenarios for budgets.
The authorization scopes required for this operation are:
openid twf.organisationUser twf.user (readBudgets | readBudgetScenarios | writeBudgets | writeBudgetScenarios)

parameters.name: searchPattern
parameters.description: Optional, pattern for search budgets by its code, name or description.

parameters.name: modifiedSince
parameters.description: Optional. Filters budgets modified since specified date. The default value is null.

parameters.name: includeYearsSummary
parameters.description: Optional, include years summary or not. The default value is true.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset. Number of budgets that should be skiped if any found. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max count of budgets in a list. Default value is 50.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Optional, field name for order. Possible values: 'code', 'name', 'descrition', 'createdAt' or 'lastModiedAt'. Defaut value is 'code'

parameters.name: asc
parameters.description: Optional, asceding or desceding order. The default value is true.

parameters.name: organisationId
parameters.description: The GUID of the organisation

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The GUID of the company

get.description:

parameters.name: modifiedSince
parameters.description: Optional. Filters budgets modified since specified date. The default value is null.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset. Number of budgets that should be skiped if any found. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max count of budgets in a list. Default value is 50.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Optional, field name for order. Possible values: 'code', 'name', 'descrition', 'year', 'createdAt' or 'lastModiedAt'. Defaut value is 'code'

parameters.name: asc
parameters.description: Optional, asceding or desceding order. The default value is true.

parameters.name: organisationId

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The GUID of the company

get.summary: Returns actions of the fixed asset.
get.description:
Returns actions of the fixed asset. Caching can be used. Response body (the resource itself) and 'ETag' response header should be stored on the client side. The saved ETag should be passed in a 'If-None-Match' header on further requests to the endpoint. If the resource is not changed, a NotModified (304) response will be sent back.
The authorization scopes required for this operation are:
openid twf.organisationUser twf.user readFixedAssets

parameters.description: Version of fixed asset actions resource. Could be '*' or version number

parameters.name: Accept

Specifying certain media types (application/hal+json, application/json) 
			which are acceptable for the response. 
			Specifying required API version in format 'version=api_version', where 'api_version' is number or 'latest'

parameters.name: organisationId
parameters.description: The GUID of the organisation

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The GUID of the company

200.description: Returns actions of the fixed asset.

403.description: The current role doesn't have access to this functionality

404.description: Fixed asset with specified id does not exist.

get.summary: Returns a list of fixed assets.
get.description:
Returns a list of fixed assets filtered by search parameters.
The authorization scopes required for this operation are:
openid twf.organisationUser twf.user readFixedAssets
Response model returns only fields marked as default unless explicitly requested via the fields parameter see extended documentation

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of assets that should be skipped. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit of returned assets. Default value is 20.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description:
The fields by which the selected assets are ordered. 
Valid values are 'description', 'lastDepreciatedPeriod', 'investmentDate', 
'firstUseDate', 'disposeDate', 'code', 'groupName' and 'name'. 
The default value is 'description'.

parameters.name: asc
parameters.description: Sorts the selected assets in ascending order. The default value is 'true'.

parameters.name: searchPattern
parameters.description: Search pattern. Search is done in 'code', 'description' and 'groupName' fields. Default value is empty string.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Filter by asset status. 
Valid values are 'toBeActivated', 'active', 'inactive', 'disposed', 'deleted', 'inactiveBySplit', 
'inactiveByReversedSplit', 'notInUse', 'inactiveByMerge', 'inactiveByReversedMerge', 
'inactiveAnyReason' and 'inactiveByUndoSell'. 
The default value is 'null', in this case all statuses except 'deleted' are returned.

parameters.name: regime
parameters.description:
Filter by asset regime. 
Valid values are 'generic', 'fiscal', 'commercial' and 'economic''. 
The default value is 'null', in this case default regime is returned.

parameters.name: taxReason
parameters.description: Filter by tax reason. Filtering is done by 'taxReason' field of assets. Default value is 'null'.

parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: Filter by location id. Filtering is done by 'locationId' field of assets in combination with year and period filters. Default value is 'null'.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Filter by group id. Filtering is done by 'groupId' field of assets in combination with year filter. Default value is 'null'.

parameters.name: classId
parameters.description: Filter by class id. Filtering is done by 'classId' field of assets in combination with year filter. Default value is 'null'.

parameters.name: typeId
parameters.description: Filter by asset type 1 id. Filtering is done by 'assetType1Id' field of assets in combination with year filter. Default value is 'null'.

parameters.name: timeRelatedFiltersYear
parameters.description: Year filter component for time related filters. Default value is 'null'.

parameters.name: timeRelatedFiltersPeriodNumber
parameters.description: Period number filter component for time related filters. Default value is 'null'.

parameters.name: firstUseFrom
parameters.description: First use from date. Default value is 'null'.

parameters.name: firstUseTo
parameters.description: First use to date. Default value is 'null'.

parameters.name: investmentFrom
parameters.description: Investment from date. Default value is 'null'.

parameters.name: investmentTo
parameters.description: Investment to date. Default value is 'null'.

parameters.name: amountFrom
parameters.description: Filter by net book value from. Default value is 'null'.

parameters.name: amountTo
parameters.description: Filter by net book value to. Default value is 'null'.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description:
Specifying certain media types (application/hal+json, application/json) 
			which are acceptable for the response. 
			Specifying required API version in format 'version=api_version', where 'api_version' is number or 'latest'

parameters.name: organisationId
parameters.description: The GUID of the organisation

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The GUID of the company

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify fields to include in the response. When not present, the default set of fields is used. Use an asterisk '*' to include all fields. see extended documentation

200.description: Returns a list of fixed assets.

403.description: The current role doesn't have access to this functionality

get.description:
Returns the requested fixed asset details. Caching can be used. Response body (the resource itself) and 'ETag' response header should be stored on the client side. The saved ETag should be passed in a 'If-None-Match' header on further requests to the endpoint. If the resource is not changed, a NotModified (304) response will be sent back.
The authorization scopes required for this operation are:
openid twf.organisationUser twf.user readFixedAssets
Response model returns only fields marked as default unless explicitly requested via the fields parameter see extended documentation

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description:
Specifying certain media types (application/hal+json, application/json) 
			which are acceptable for the response. 
			Specifying required API version in format 'version=api_version', where 'api_version' is number or 'latest'

parameters.name: organisationId

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The GUID of the company

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify fields to include in the response. When not present, the default set of fields is used. Use an asterisk '*' to include all fields. see extended documentation

parameters.description: Search pattern for code or name or type. If omitted all VAT Codes are returned.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter VAT Codes by type (sales or purchase). If omitted both types are returned.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset. Number of items that should be skipped. If the number is higher than the total number of items, nothing will be returned. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items returned. Default value is 50.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: The fields by which the items are ordered.Valid values are code,name or type, default value is code.

parameters.name: asc
parameters.description: Order the selected items in ascending. The default value is true.

parameters.name: organisationId
parameters.description: The GUID of the organisation

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The GUID of the company

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify fields to include in the response. When not present, the default set of fields is used. Use an asterisk '*' to include all fields. see extended documentation

200.description: Returns list of VAT Codes with the specified search parameters

403.description: The current role doesn't have access to this functionality

parameters.description: Unit of measure, monetary by default

parameters.description: Mandatory. General ledger accound id budget lines to be selected

parameters.name: costCenterId
parameters.description: Cost center accound id budget lines to be selected. Can be null

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Project accound id budget lines to be selected. Can be null

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset. Number of budget lines that should be skiped if any found. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max count of budget lines in list. Default value is 50.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Optional, field name for order. Possible values: 'createdAt' or 'lastModifiedAt'. Uses default order if it is not specified.

parameters.name: asc
parameters.description: Optional, asceding or desceding order. The default value is true.

parameters.name: modifiedSince
parameters.description: Optional. Filters budget lines modified since specified date. The default value is null.

parameters.name: organisationId
parameters.description: The GUID of the organisation

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The GUID of the company

200.description: Returns paged list of budget lines filtered by specified parameters.

403.description: The current role doesn't have access to this functionality

delete.summary: Delete all budget lines related to specified ledger.
delete.description:
Delete all budget lines related to specified ledger.
The authorization scopes required for this operation are:
openid twf.organisationUser twf.user writeBudgets

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of budget lines belongs to

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Year budget lines made for

parameters.name: unitOfMeasure
parameters.description: Unit of measure, monetary by default

parameters.name: generalLedgerId
parameters.description: Mandatory. General ledger accound id budget lines to be selected

parameters.name: costCenterId
parameters.description: Cost center accound id budget lines to be selected. Can be null

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Project accound id budget lines to be selected. Can be null

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset. Number of budget lines that should be skiped if any found. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max count of budget lines in list. Default value is 50.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Optional, field name for order. Possible values: 'createdAt' or 'lastModifiedAt'. Uses default order if it is not specified.

parameters.name: asc
parameters.description: Optional, asceding or desceding order. The default value is true.

parameters.name: modifiedSince
parameters.description: Optional. Filters budget lines modified since specified date. The default value is null.

parameters.name: organisationId
parameters.description: The GUID of the organisation

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The GUID of the company

204.description: Response does not have any content

403.description: The current role doesn't have access to this functionality

revenueTypeId.description: ID of revenue type. If not provided on POST request it is taken from Company settings by default

offset.description: The number of ledger accounts that should be skipped if any found. The default value is 0.

limit.description: The maximum number of ledger accounts to return. The default value is 50. The minimum value is 1.

asc.description: Order results ascending or descending. See OrderBy.

searchPattern.description: Search pattern. It is used for searching by name and code. Default value is empty string.

types.description: Filter by account type. Available account types are: 'Activity, Balance, CostCenter, Creditor, Debtor, FixedAsset, ProfitAndLoss, Project'. The default value is 'Balance,ProfitAndLoss'.

modifiedSince.description: If present accounts modified on or after the specified time are returned.

unitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure, monetary by default

lastModifiedAt.description: UTC date and time when budget line was modified last

createdAt.description: UTC date and time when budget line was created

period.description: Optional, Period of budget lines to be selected

type.description: Optional, The type of budget line value to be selected, allowed values Monetary, Quantity and all. Default value is All

generalLedgerId.description: Optional, General ledger accound id budget lines to be selected

costCenterId.description: Optional, cost center accound id budget lines to be selected

projectId.description: Optional, project accound id budget lines to be selected

modifiedSince.description: Optional. Filters budget lines modified since specified date. The default value is null.

offset.description: Offset. Number of budget lines that should be skiped if any found. Default value is 0.

limit.description: Max count of budget lines in list. Default value is 50.

orderBy.description: Optional, field name for order. Possible values: 'createdAt' or 'lastModifiedAt'. Uses default order if it is not specified.

asc.description: Optional, asceding or desceding order. The default value is true.

targetYear.description: Year to copy curent budget to

unitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure, monetary by default

generalLedgerId.description: Mandatory. General ledger accound id budget lines to be selected

costCenterId.description: Cost center accound id budget lines to be selected. Can be null

projectId.description: Project accound id budget lines to be selected. Can be null

offset.description: Offset. Number of budget lines that should be skiped if any found. Default value is 0.

limit.description: Max count of budget lines in list. Default value is 50.

orderBy.description: Optional, field name for order. Possible values: 'createdAt' or 'lastModifiedAt'. Uses default order if it is not specified.

asc.description: Optional, asceding or desceding order. The default value is true.

modifiedSince.description: Optional. Filters budget lines modified since specified date. The default value is null.

searchPattern.description: Optional, pattern for search budgets by its code, name or description.

modifiedSince.description: Optional. Filters budgets modified since specified date. The default value is null.

includeYearsSummary.description: Optional, include years summary or not. The default value is true.

offset.description: Offset. Number of budgets that should be skiped if any found. Default value is 0.

limit.description: Max count of budgets in a list. Default value is 50.

orderBy.description: Optional, field name for order. Possible values: 'code', 'name', 'descrition', 'createdAt' or 'lastModiedAt'. Defaut value is 'code'

asc.description: Optional, asceding or desceding order. The default value is true.

useSystemPeriods.description: Use Opening balance and Period 55 in the budget or not. The default value is false

lastModifiedAt.description: UTC date and time when budget line was modified last

createdAt.description: UTC date and time when budget line was created

useSystemPeriods.description: Use Opening balance and Period 55 in the budget or not. The default value is false
Use Opening balance and Period 55 in the budget or not. The default value is false

searchPattern.description: Optional, pattern for search budgets by its code, name or description.

modifiedSince.description: Optional. Filters budgets modified since specified date. The default value is null.

offset.description: Offset. Number of budgets that should be skiped if any found. Default value is 0.

limit.description: Max count of budgets in a list. Default value is 50.

orderBy.description: Optional, field name for order. Possible values: 'code', 'name', 'descrition', 'year', 'createdAt' or 'lastModiedAt'. Defaut value is 'code'

asc.description: Optional, asceding or desceding order. The default value is true.

useSystemPeriods.description: Use Opening balance and Period 55 in the budget or not. The default value is false

lastModifiedAt.description: UTC date and time when budget line was modified last

createdAt.description: UTC date and time when budget line was created

transactions.description: Posted transactions as result of the action

user.description: Code of the user who performed the action

activationStatus.description: Determines whether the class is active

used.description: Determines whether the class is in use

version.description: Revision version of the class (Default field)

purchaseValueAccountId.description: Purchase value account id of the class

depreciationBalanceAccountId.description: Depreciation balance account id of the class

depreciationProfitAndLossAccountId.description: Depreciation profit and loss account id of the class

disposalBalanceAccountId.description: Disposal balance account id of the class

disposalResultAccountId.description: Disposal result account id of the class

revaluationBalanceAccountId.description: Revaluation balance account id of the class

revaluationProfitAndLossAccountId.description: Revaluation profit and loss account id of the class

revaluationDepreciationBalanceAccountId.description: Revaluation depreciation balance account id of the class

revaluationDepreciationProfitAndLossAcco.description: Revaluation depreciation profit and loss account id of the class

lifetime.description: Average number of years an asset is considered useable before its value is fully depreciated

lifetimeType.description: Lifetime type of the depreciation method

offset.description: Number of fixed asset classes that should be skipped. Default value is 0.

limit.description: Limit of returned fixed asset classes. Default value is 50.

searchPattern.description: Search pattern. Search is done in 'lifetime' and 'name'. Default value is empty string.

orderBy.description: The fields by which selected fixed asset classes are ordered. The valid value is 'name'. The default value is 'name'.

asc.description: Sorts selected fixed asset classes in ascending order. The default value is 'true'.

lifetimeType.description: Lifetime type of the depreciation method

lifetime.description: Average number of years an asset is considered useable before its value is fully depreciated

used.description: Determines whether class is in use

offset.description: Offset. Number of items that should be skipped. If the number is higher than the total number of items, nothing will be returned. Default value is 0.

limit.description: Maximum number of items returned. Default value is 50.

id.description: The ID to uniquely identify the Fixed Asset Group within a company

name.description: A friendly name to uniquely identify the Fixed Asset Group within a company

id.description: The ID to uniquely identify the Fixed asset group within a company (Default field)

name.description: A friendly name to uniquely identify the Fixed asset group within a company (Default field)

startYear.description: Proposed value for the year when creating the next stop value. It's a calculated field

stopValues.description: The list of stop values per regime asscociated with the Fixed asset group for a year (Default field)

version.description: The current version of the Fixed asset group. Increments for each update on the Fixed asset group (Default field)

valuesPerRegime.description: The list of stop values per regime asscociated with the Fixed asset group for a year

year.description: This year specifies the year that the values per regime apply to. For a Fixed asset group a stop value can be configured for a year per regime. For the calculation of depreciation a stop value is used for a year when supplied or from the previous available year when the stop value has not been supplied.

offset.description: Number of assets that should be skipped. Default value is 0.

limit.description: Limit of returned assets. Default value is 20.

orderBy.description:
The fields by which the selected assets are ordered. 
Valid values are 'description', 'lastDepreciatedPeriod', 'investmentDate', 
'firstUseDate', 'disposeDate', 'code', 'groupName' and 'name'. 
The default value is 'description'.

asc.description: Sorts the selected assets in ascending order. The default value is 'true'.

searchPattern.description: Search pattern. Search is done in 'code', 'description' and 'groupName' fields. Default value is empty string.

status.description:
Filter by asset status. 
Valid values are 'toBeActivated', 'active', 'inactive', 'disposed', 'deleted', 'inactiveBySplit', 
'inactiveByReversedSplit', 'notInUse', 'inactiveByMerge', 'inactiveByReversedMerge', 
'inactiveAnyReason' and 'inactiveByUndoSell'. 
The default value is 'null', in this case all statuses except 'deleted' are returned.

regime.description:
Filter by asset regime. 
Valid values are 'generic', 'fiscal', 'commercial' and 'economic''. 
The default value is 'null', in this case default regime is returned.

taxReason.description: Filter by tax reason. Filtering is done by 'taxReason' field of assets. Default value is 'null'.

locationId.description: Filter by location id. Filtering is done by 'locationId' field of assets in combination with year and period filters. Default value is 'null'.

groupId.description: Filter by group id. Filtering is done by 'groupId' field of assets in combination with year filter. Default value is 'null'.

classId.description: Filter by class id. Filtering is done by 'classId' field of assets in combination with year filter. Default value is 'null'.

typeId.description: Filter by asset type 1 id. Filtering is done by 'assetType1Id' field of assets in combination with year filter. Default value is 'null'.

timeRelatedFiltersYear.description: Year filter component for time related filters. Default value is 'null'.

timeRelatedFiltersPeriodNumber.description: Period number filter component for time related filters. Default value is 'null'.

firstUseFrom.description: First use from date. Default value is 'null'.

firstUseTo.description: First use to date. Default value is 'null'.

investmentFrom.description: Investment from date. Default value is 'null'.

investmentTo.description: Investment to date. Default value is 'null'.

amountFrom.description: Filter by net book value from. Default value is 'null'.

amountTo.description: Filter by net book value to. Default value is 'null'.

lastDepreciatedPeriod.description: Last depreciation period of the asset

firstUseDate.description: First use date of the asset

youngestBalances.description: Purchase price and net book value of the asset

id.description: Id of the fixed asset (Default field)

code.description: Code of the fixed asset (Default field)

description.description: Description of the fixed asset (Default field)

status.description: Status of the fixed asset (Default field)

transactions.description: Linked transactions of the fixed asset (Default field)

nextPeriodToDepreciate.description: Next depreciation period of the fixed asset (Default field)

depreciationSettings.description: Depreciation settings of the fixed asset (Default field)

attachmentIds.description: Attachment ids of the fixed asset

purchaseValues.description: Purchase values of the fixed asset

version.description: Version of the fixed asset (Default field)

classes.description: Collection of time related classes of the fixed asset (Default field)

costCenters.description: Collection of cost centers of the fixed asset (Default field)

groups.description: Collection of groups of the fixed asset (Default field)

isImportedWithMimicHistory.description: Determines whether the fixed asset is imported with mimic history

lastMimicPeriod.description: Last mimic period of the fixed asset

parentFixedAssets.description: Parent fixed assets of the fixed asset

childFixedAssets.description: Child fixed assets of the fixed asset

lastRevaluationPeriod.description: Last revaluation period of the fixed asset

targetCompany.description: Code of the target company the fixed asset is sold to

sourceCompany.description: Code of the source company the fixed asset is imported from

purchaseValueAccount.description: Purchase value account of the fixed asset

youngestBalances.description: Purchase price and net book value of the asset (Default field)

spreadFor.description: Specifies for what value (debit or credit) to spread, debit by default

spreadTemplate.description: Optional, what template to use for spreading, even spreading will be used if not set

searchPattern.description: Optional, pattern for search spread templates by its code or name.

modifiedSince.description: Optional. Filters spread templates modified since specified date. The default value is null.

offset.description: Offset. Number of spread templates that should be skiped if any found. Default value is 0.

limit.description: Max count of spread templates in a list. Default value is 50.

orderBy.description: Optional, field name for order. Possible values: 'code', 'name', 'createdAt' or 'lastModiedAt'. Defaut value is 'code'

asc.description: Optional, asceding or desceding order. The default value is true.

includeDistributionData.description: Optional, include distribution by periods or not. The default value is false.

lastModifiedAt.description: UTC date and time when spreading template was modified last

distribution.description: Distribution by period for this spreading template
Distribution by period for this spreading template
Distribution by period for this spreading template

searchPattern.description: Search pattern for code or name or type. If omitted all VAT Codes are returned.

type.description: Filter VAT Codes by type (sales or purchase). If omitted both types are returned.

offset.description: Offset. Number of items that should be skipped. If the number is higher than the total number of items, nothing will be returned. Default value is 0.

limit.description: Maximum number of items returned. Default value is 50.

orderBy.description: The fields by which the items are ordered.Valid values are code,name or type, default value is code.

asc.description: Order the selected items in ascending. The default value is true.

id.description: The ID to uniquely identify the VAT Code within a Company

version.description: Shows the current version of the VAT Code. Increments for each update on the VAT Code

createdAt.description: Timestamp on which the VAT Code was created

lastModifiedAt.description: Timestamp on which the VAT Code was last modified

modifiedBy.description: The code of the user who is responsible for the last modification on the VAT Code

code.description: Code of the VAT Code by which it can be uniquely identified within a Company

type.description: The Type will determine if the VAT code will be shown or not in certain transaction types, when making manual entries

name.description: Friendly name for uniquely identifying the VAT Code

shortName.description: The short name is used to identify the VAT Code in places where there is not enough room for the full name

invoiceText.description: Optional. Specifies the additional text to be shown on an invoice in case of a reverse charge

translations.description: Optional. Translations for VAT code in different languages, being English (United Kingdom), Dutch (The Netherlands), Dutch (Belgium), German (Germany), French (France) and French (Belgium)

rates.description: List of VAT Rates of which one will be applied, on a financial transaction line using this code, based on the start date of the rate

language.description: The language of translation for VAT Code name and short name fields

name.description: Name in the language specified by language

shortName.description: Short Name in the language specified by language

invoiceText.description: Invoice text in the language specified by language

id.description: The ID to uniquely identify the VAT Rate within a VAT Code

version.description: Current version of the VAT Rate. Increments for each update on the VAT Rate

createdAt.description: Timestamp on which the VAT Rate was created

lastModifiedAt.description: Timestamp on which the VAT Rate was last modified

modifiedBy.description: The code of the user who is responsible for the last modification on the VAT Rate

name.description: Friendly name for uniquely identifying the VAT Rate

shortName.description: The short name is used to identify the VAT Rate in places where there is not enough room for the name

startDate.description: Date that the VAT Rate comes into effect. Unique to each VAT rate within a VAT code. For two VAT rates, start date of second VAT rate with the most recent date, will also determine the end date for the older VAT rate. When using a VAT code with multiple rates, Twinfield will determine based on the invoice date/transaction date, what rate should be applied

percent.description: Percentage of the VAT rate, to come to an amount for the line. The percentage field needs to be between 0 and 100

discountAccountId.description: Optional. Configured if the country allows discount to be given on the VAT amount. The general ledger account set on this field will be used, when generating the VAT lines for financial transactions

writeOffAccountId.description: Optional. Configured if the country allows a write off to be applied on the VAT amount. The general ledger account set on this field will be used, when generating the VAT lines for financial transactions

translations.description: Optional. Translations for VAT rate in different languages, being English (United Kingdom), Dutch (The Netherlands), Dutch (Belgium), German (Germany), French (France) and French (Belgium)

allocationRules.description: List of the Allocation Rules on the VAT Rate. Defines the transaction lines to be generated when the VAT Rate is applied

language.description: The language of translation for VAT Code name and short name fields

name.description: Name in the language specified by language

shortName.description: Short Name in the language specified by language

ruleId.description: Uniquely identifies the allocation rule within the scope of the VAT Rate

isVatLine.description: Determines whether the allocation rule is mapped as a VAT line. If set to false, the line will be classified as a detail line in the transaction and it will make it ineligible to be selected in a VAT/ICT return

percent.description: Percentage of the VAT amount to be allotted to this Allocation Rule. The sum of percentages on allocation rules within a VAT rate, must be either 0% or 100%. Range is between -999 to 999

generalLedgerAccountId.description: Mandatory. Determines what general ledger account will be used for the financial transaction line generated based on this allocation rule

costCenterAccountId.description: Optional. Determines what cost center account will be used for the financial transaction line generated based on this allocation rule

vatGroupId.description: The VAT group applied for the amount of the allocation rule. In case the VAT group is for a country DE, GB, IE or NL, it will also determine the place for the amount in the VAT/ICT return if the line is also a VAT line
